entry.title: Winter Storm Watch issued February 27 at 2:33PM AKST until March 01 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...HEAVY SNOW LIKELY STARTING TUESDAY NIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY... .A rapidly strengthening low will develop in the Gulf of Alaska during the day on Tuesday. Precipitation will begin in the Yakutat area before extending to the south during the overnight hours of Tuesday

entry.cap:areaDesc: Laramie Valley; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills

entry.summary: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Southwest Wyoming. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST Tuesday.
